titles.title: No Federal Funds for Ballot Harvesting Act
No Federal Funds for Ballot Harvesting Act

To amend the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to prohibit the use of Federal funds for the administration of an election for Federal office in States which permit ballot harvesting, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
No Federal Funds for Ballot Harvesting Act
This bill requires each state, in order to receive federal funds for election administration, to prohibit the knowing collection and transmission of a ballot in a federal election that was mailed to another person (commonly referred to as ballot harvesting), with exceptions.
